channel.title: Personal Blog — Software Engineering & Physics
channel.description: Recent content on Personal Blog — Software Engineering & Physics

item.title: Documenting with a Static Site Generator
item.description:
Introduction

This project is my third iteration using Static Site Generators (SSG). These sites are built with a framework and the content is based on templates with markdown (.md) files, which offer great flexibility for creating written content (titles, subtitles, lists, images, etc.).

item.title: Is taking the toll worth it?
item.description:
Is taking the toll worth it?

I drive the México–Toluca highway every day to get to work, and I often wonder whether paying the toll is always worth it.

item.title: Elements
item.description:

    11. Code and Syntax Highlighting
    12. Blockquote
    13. Tables
    14. Image
    15. Gallery
    16. Slider
    17. Youtube video
    18. Custom video

Here is an example of headings. You can use this heading by the following markdown rules. For example: use # for heading 1 and use ###### for heading 6.

item.title: Lijemutu
item.description: I am a software engineer with a BSc in Physics. I build products, experiment with business ideas, and publish technical writeups and project updates here. Welcome — explore my projects and get in touch.
